name: Santa Claus in... Eve in a Hurry (DEMO)
name_original: Santa Claus in... Eve in a Hurry (DEMO)
description:
A joyful 3D adventure game where you have to help Santa recover all of the lost presents and save Christmas. 

It includes cinematic cutscenes(silent), rare controls, two enemies, 2 levels.

Controls:

Use mouse to look left and right

Use left click to jump

Use Left Control to sprint

Press ESC to close the game (gameplay only)
